website_summaries.verdict: A functional, field-tested harness that is affordable enough for weekend DIY-ers and sturdy enough for the pros.
pros: Sturdy straps that will protect users in slip-and-fall situations
Back and hip D-rings allow for multiple tie-off options for added safety
cons: Inexperienced users will need extra time to figure out how to put this on and adjust the straps correctly
Stiff and uncomfortable to work in for long periods

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine, Should be one size fits Most
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine, Should be one size fits Most, at 6'2" and 270 lb with a 40" waist this harness was too small for me mostly due to small leg openings/ distance from the back cross to the leg openings, with the leg holes fully opened if I bent over it would pull on the front of my legs, I was able to get it buckled but it was far from comfortable, If I had to do over I would have paid more for a larger size but due to time limitations I worked with what I had. I have used other harnesses over the years that have fit better but many of them were the larger commercial style harnesses.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for guys 6' or under
customer_reviews.text: Used this whole working on my barn roof. Funny, I don't remember it being that high up when I built it 20 years ago. This is a good solidly made product. I gave only 4 stars because it barely fit my height. I'm 6'2" and 190lbs and it felt like it was a half size too small, like the height max was 5'10". Even with the leg straps all the way out I was singing saprano every time I bent over which is just about all the time when you're working on a roof. But it got me through the job and thankfully I never had to test it.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: Hubby is 5'11 199lbs, this is a substantial peice of equipment! It's fits well and needs a little breaking in. We paired it with the Guardian rope and roof rings.
customer_reviews.author: n8

customer_reviews.title: Good protection for the price paid
customer_reviews.text: I'm afraid of heights. I need some safety harness when I work on 2nd story house. This Guardian 1703 harness fits me nicely. It's still a bit loose since I'm a smaller guy but still secure enough to not slip off me. I've tested its restraining power on the ground and yes it will jerk you back when the line ends. I expected the harness to bruise me but it didn't. It's protection that you really don't want to do without.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbone

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but beware of torso length it will accomodate.
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these primarily due to the Guardian name, and the cost. S-L doesn't tell you much regarding the size of person it will fit. One of the guys was 5' 6" and it worked fine. I'm about 5' 10" and found it getting short in torso length. Our fall protection worked well, so we ordered more; but since I had 2 S-L, I got 2 XL-XXL since most of the guys are my height or more.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Earickson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, well made. Perfect for the low level heights where a harness is required by many of our clients when working on their equipment. Easily adjustable and sufficient strap lengths to be able to use between multiple different sized users.
customer_reviews.author: D. Galineau

customer_reviews.title: Quality Quality Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a really quality product. You can tell it is very high strength. Adjusts well to the body. I have no worries this thing will holding up against tough projects.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Simple, uncompliated and made for bigger guys
customer_reviews.text: This harness is simple and durable. I'm 5' 8" at 165 lbs with a 33" waist. I'm not a gymnast, but I do have some coordination. It wasn't hard for me to get it on or off. This harness is made for much bigger guys but I am still able to use it. It cleans easily and doesn't take up too much room in storage or weigh a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Fit me perfect
customer_reviews.text: This fit perfect I am 5’3” 180lbs this fit great even if I get skinny lol this will still fit.
customer_reviews.author: Saw

customer_reviews.title: Great Harness!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a very big guy needed to find the right fall protection that is comfortable and economical. I love it, fits well which others was never comfortable. Can't even tell when I'm wearing it. Must buy indeed and it's OSHA approved.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando

customer_reviews.title: Right for the price, loose on smaller bodies
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'7" & 135lbs and the harness is somewhat loose on me, even when fully cinched up. The straps around the shoulder have sharp edges which dig in. Overall, I am satisfied for the price, and it does work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and design. Will update review after use to determine durability and safety factor. *Update: Product now tried and tested and took my 230 pounds like a champion! Very well worth the price! Very secure and very well made. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MJLV

customer_reviews.title: It has a very sturdy feeling. The buckles are hefty
customer_reviews.text: I unfortunately didn't get to use the harness as the job didn't require it any longer. However, I did open to inspect and try on when I received it. It has a very sturdy feeling. The buckles are hefty. It fit well and has adjustments for various sizes. I would feel safe with this.
customer_reviews.author: Will VF

customer_reviews.title: Great product, very safe, comfortable and great price.
customer_reviews.text: Using this for work around the house, in trees etc. Absolutely great quality with an amazing prize. I feel very safe with this, and it seems to be great for every size (I'm 6'4 and not really skinny)
customer_reviews.author: An Honest Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Fits good and easy to get in and out off.
customer_reviews.text: Used this when doing construction of my 2 story extension. Putting siding on the second floor is not easy and you can easily fall. This harness fits good, although I would say that it probably is designed for much bigger people.
customer_reviews.author: HonestAbe

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine. We work on roofing and all the crew ...
customer_reviews.text: When i got it, it was small for me, so i gave it to a friend of mine. Works just fine. We work on roofing and all the crew uses this kind of harness. Defenetly buying again. Just pay attention when selecting the size. The only reason i'm gonna change it is beacuse of safety rules. The harness is very durable, well made, and very trusty.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Alvarado Ayala

customer_reviews.title: not the most comfortable around the leg area but it works and is ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a high quality harness, not the most comfortable around the leg area but it works and is priced right
customer_reviews.author: AF

customer_reviews.title: Fits most sizes
customer_reviews.text: Has held up very well at work. Comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hall

customer_reviews.title: well made though was a bit big for me
customer_reviews.text: I got a small, but it's still on the big side even when fully adjusted - I'm 5'9 30" waist 130#. Though it still holds tight enough to be effective and comfortable enough. Nicely made and easy to wear, I only used it once or twice for some roofing / high ladder projects I needed to do.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Very good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very good product for the price paid. I bought it to do repair work on a very high roof area and I felt a lot more confident that if there was a fall it would not turn into a tragedy. Give you protection, safety and peace of mind for a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: erlulu

customer_reviews.title: Good general-use fall arrest harness
customer_reviews.text: I've used a wide variety of employer-provided personal fall-arrest equipment, and this is one of the best general-use harnesses I've used. I bought this one for personal home use and am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: John McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Made In China
customer_reviews.text: The description states "Made in US". The packaging and harness both have "Made In China" on them. Product description is inaccurate.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great price and works as expected... love the convenience of amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to write a review on fall protection in regards to how well it works since very few have actually tested that function. But judging by it's comfort and how well it's made I'd say it's a good harness.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew D.

customer_reviews.title: Using it to help me get my elderly mother in & out of the car.
customer_reviews.text: I was using them for my elderly mother getting her in & out of the car. The weight did not help. Looking for something a lot more lighter for her.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce wayne

customer_reviews.title: Good Item
customer_reviews.text: The person I got is for was very happy with, and her boss paid much more for the exact same item elsewhere=WIN
customer_reviews.author: Personof1

customer_reviews.title: Great harness. Positioning D-rings were a must for solo ...
customer_reviews.text: Great harness. Positioning D-rings were a must for solo work on 12/12 pitch roof.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and is decently comfortable and I am 6'3". I fortunately did not test the true function of it but I have had zero issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: X EOD

customer_reviews.title: That product seems to be a great product. It is very comfortable and is not ...
customer_reviews.text: That product seems to be a great product.It is very comfortable and is not very heavy. I like the design and the price is very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Misho

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This harness is relatively easy to put on and is comfortable to "hang" in.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Baertschy

customer_reviews.title: Good harness easily adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: Very good harness for the amount paid and easy to adjust unlike others I’ve used.
customer_reviews.author: Lmac70

customer_reviews.title: This works perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: This works perfect for me. I haven't fallen off a roof with it, but I feel comfortable trusting it to catch me if I do.
customer_reviews.author: Tristin B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for my Fall Protection equipment. Arrived on time and as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: Not small enough
customer_reviews.text: size states from small to large, but small was not small enough. Constructed of good material and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Father-knows-best

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on and utilize when needed
customer_reviews.text: Very strong & durable. Easy to put on and utilize when needed.
customer_reviews.author: PhotoJim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used for a "hanging" gag on stage. Performed well in safety tests, has plenty of adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: Nucky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it, is the best Harnes for the price I paid. I really like this harnes
customer_reviews.author: Victor H. Caceres

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: now i dont have to wear the stinky gear everyone else is wearing
customer_reviews.author: chris frisch

customer_reviews.title: The harness is a pretty good harness but it would be better if the ...
customer_reviews.text: The harness is a pretty good harness but it would be better if the harness had a front eye in the hip area so you could belay or use for climbing or zip lining ect. But it is one of the better harnesses I own
customer_reviews.author: hey don't read this

customer_reviews.title: Fall protection
customer_reviews.text: I sent it back. It was the wrong type for what I needed it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fast shipping and product received was as described. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Bao

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works like expected. The person using it is also on the heavy side, so thumbs up to you guys on a well made product.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect harness
customer_reviews.text: This is the best harness and the delivery was super fast.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Swann

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: have not used it yet. but it seems to be well constructed
customer_reviews.author: John T Reisinger

customer_reviews.title: A very good safety harness
customer_reviews.text: A comfortable harness with a D Ring on both sides of the middriff which allows you to use a Tie Off to prevent falling when you can't tie off to the ring on the back. I bought this to use when working on a 50 foot antenna tower. It cost less than $50 - my life and well being is worth more than that. How about yours?
customer_reviews.author: Bob-OC

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good investment in safety.
customer_reviews.text: Using this just for going up to clean the chimney, for now. Fits nicely and gives me the confidence to actually stand up there and to believe that should I fall, I probably won't break my neck, etc. All those reviews about incorrect strap placement were incorrect.

customer_reviews.title: I did not fall to actually try it but it fit well and was comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big guy (250 lb) and this worked amazingly fell. I did not fall to actually try it but it fit well and was comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Alex R

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits well over winter clothes. I'm 6' 2" and 250lbs. Item was as described and delivered on time
customer_reviews.author: Adam Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Why pay more?
customer_reviews.text: It's superior design and high quality of components offers maximum fall protection for a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo Peralta

customer_reviews.title: No fall now, just "Yo-Yo".
customer_reviews.text: My kids made me get this so when I'm running around on the roof I won't hit the ground when I fall off. So now when I fall off I'll just hang there like a yo-yo until one of the neighbors finds my bloated corps about a week later. There's a pretty picture. What the heck's wrong with my kids anyway?
customer_reviews.author: G'Pa Dee

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with quality of this product, it covers ...
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with quality of this product, it covers all my safety needs.
customer_reviews.author: SAL CORNEJO

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with the quality
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I am very pleased with the quality. And being that it has less anchor points it weighs less and make it easier to carry in my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Derby

customer_reviews.title: Color coated harness makes it easy to put on and it was WAY cheaper and ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to use in my tree stand. Color coated harness makes it easy to put on and it was WAY cheaper and stronger than a camo "hunting" model:-)
customer_reviews.author: Mary Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like the harness but wondering if it is ANSI approved.
customer_reviews.author: steve mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delivered in a timely manner. Item was exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Dickson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap do not buy not described correctly
customer_reviews.text: Very misleading on the way though product as described not even remotely close to what it actually should be
customer_reviews.author: Carl Shelton

customer_reviews.title: not bad..
customer_reviews.text: It has no belt on the waist. The best place to hold a human body is the waist. Nice rings but still it's missing something. I didn't use it for the job because I felt it's not gonna keep me together.
customer_reviews.author: Damouni

customer_reviews.title: Make sure any safety harness you purchase has metal D-Rings on the front of the harness.
customer_reviews.text: The overall harness looks well made. However, the two front D-Rings appear to be plastic. It is possible that they are anodized aluminum, but I don't think they are. If they are plastic, I don't think this harness could be safely used in a number of situations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I should have paid more for a better one
customer_reviews.text: This harness I not safe to use, you get what you pay for, I should have paid more for a better one
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy M.

customer_reviews.title: "PIECE OF S***"
customer_reviews.text: It a cheap knock off ,it broke after a hour as in the touchsreen stop working first then it shut down and didn't. Charge .POINT IS ITS A PIECE OF S***
customer_reviews.author: julio cesar garcia

product_meta.title: Guardian Fall Protection 1703 Velocity Economy Harness HUV Pass Thru Chest and Tongue Buckle Legs, Small/Large
product_meta.description:
Size:S - L| Style:Pass Through Chest/Tongue Buckle LegsThe new Velocity Harness by Guardian Fall Protection brings the best economy harness to the market. Our engineers revamped the tired old basic harness into a higher quality product that your employees and customers will enjoy.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The new Velocity Harness by Guardian Fall Protection brings the best economy harness to the market. Our engineers revamped the tired old basic harness into a higher quality product that your employees and customers will enjoy.
feature_bullets: Dual Lanyard Keepers: Other manufacturers provide only one or none on their economy harness
Identification: Now your employees can personalize their harnesses without jeopardizing the integrity of the webbing
